glsa.title: Heimdal: rshd privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: An error in the rshd daemon of Heimdal could allow authenticated users to elevate privileges.

background.p: Heimdal is a free implementation of Kerberos 5.

description.p: An unspecified privilege escalation vulnerability in the rshd server of Heimdal has been reported.

impact.p: Authenticated users could exploit the vulnerability to escalate privileges or to change the ownership and content of arbitrary files.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Heimdal users should upgrade to the latest version:
